name: restCallBuildTask
description: Build task to allow rest call during build or release.
author: Cdiscount Alm / Sylvain Marangon
helpMarkDown: Build task to allow rest call during build or release.

inputs.name: relativeUrl
inputs.label: Relative url
inputs.helpMarkDown: You can set the relative url to call (if the endpoint url is not enough).

inputs.name: httpVerb
inputs.label: Http method
inputs.helpMarkDown: Http method to use to call the web service.

inputs.name: body
inputs.label: Body
inputs.visibleRule: httpVerb = POST || httpVerb = PUT || httpVerb = PATCH
inputs.helpMarkDown: The body of the web service call

inputs.name: contentType
inputs.label: Content-Type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Content-Type to use to call the webService (default: application/json).

inputs.name: saveResponseToFile
inputs.label: Save response to file?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do you want to save the http response to a file?

inputs.name: outputFilePath
inputs.label: Output file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Output file path to write response into.

inputs.name: allowInvalidSSLCertificate
inputs.label: Allow invalid SSL Certificate?
inputs.helpMarkDown: Do you want to call a URL that has an invalid SSL certificate?

inputs.name: timeout
inputs.label: Timeout (in milliseconds)
inputs.helpMarkDown: Timeout to use during the webservice call (in milliseconds).
